titleStmt.title: Euery man in his humor As it hath beene sundry times publickly acted by the right Honorable the Lord Chamberlaine his seruants. Written by Ben. Iohnson.
titleStmt.author: Jonson, Ben, 1573?-1637.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By S. Stafford] for Walter Burre, and are to be sould at his shoppe in Paules Church-yarde,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
